CustomField.description: Named Credential for HITL-approved tool execution. Determines user context (service user vs per-user) for tools after human approval. Default: AgentStudioInternalAPI.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Named Credential for HITL tool execution. Controls which user context executes approved tools. Default: AgentStudioInternalAPI.
CustomField.label: HITL Approval Named Credential
